last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nazim (Mohamed Faisal) and his three siblings Haanim (Yoosuf Shafeeu), Azim (Ravee Farooq) and Ganim (Ali Azim) celebrate their mother's (Arifa Ibrahim) birthday along with their father, Haanim's wife Sheeza (Sheela Najeeb) and his son. They are joined by Habeeb and his daughter Minha (Mariyam Azza) whom Azim has a crush on and deals with an emotional abusive marriage. Meanwhile, Akmal (Ibrahim Jihad), cousin of the brothers, on a break from studies spends time enjoying in islands and is attracted towards Shauna (Aminath Rishfa) at first sight.

name: Huvaa
overview: Huvaa is a Maldivian romantic drama web television series developed for Baiskoafu by Fathimath Nahula. The series revolves around a large happy family and the impact of an incident that turns their lives upside down while revenge and discord rip the family apart. The series is produced by Baiskoafu.
